CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 6, 1954, pg. 20, reads: "Real Hit at Playhouse - Members of the cast of 'Take a Giant Step' are nearing the final curtain at the Playhouse where they have been a smash hit in the Louis Peterson drama. Playhouse audiences has been generous in their praise of the thespians who have been gallantly going through the grind and monotonous routine of preparing for the opening curtain since Feb. 6, when the play opened. The Courier photographer caught some of the cast preparing to go on stage during the last week of the production which ends Saturday...  six other members of the supporting cast join in a gabfest while waiting their turns to go on stage. Left to right, rear, Jack Brown, Robert Gordon, Billy Webster, and James Sweenie, and front, left to right, Herman McClain and Malcolm Toy... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Cast members of play "Take a Giant Step," front row, from left: Herman McClain, Malcolm Toy; back: Jack Brown, Robert Gordon, Billy Webster, and James Sweenie in dressing room of Pittsburgh Playhouse
